item.title: Sequoia unveils $950M in new early-stage funds as it strives to be ‘only as good as our next investment’
item.description: The legendary firm launched a $750 million early-stage fund targeting Series A startups and a $200 million seed fund.

item.title: Workout app Ladder launches nutrition-tracking experience
item.description: Fitness app Ladder is debuting a new nutrition tracking feature that lets you snap a photo to input macros.
